## PropertyTrack.(constructor)

Construct a PropertyTrack for a specific property.

Initializes interpolators and internal state based on the property type. If an initial `value` is provided, it seeds the starting state and default key values.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(prop: PropertyAccessor, value?: number[], embedded?: boolean);
```

## Parameters

</th><th>

Description

<tbody><tr><td>

prop


</td><td>

[PropertyAccessor](doc/markdown/./scene.propertyaccessor.md)


</td><td>

The property accessor describing what and how to animate.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

value


</td><td>

number\[\]


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Optional initial numeric values (length must match the property type).


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

embedded


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Whether this track is embedded/owned inline. Default false.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

## Exceptions

Error if the property type is unsupported for animation.
